mapper.insert: insert into member(no, id, password, jumin, job, addr, email, phone, regdate, curdate) values(#{no}, #{id}, #{password}, #{jumin}, #{job}, #{addr}, #{email}, NOW(), NOW())
mapper.select: select * from member where id=#{id} and password=#{password}
mapper.update: update member set password=#{password}, jumin=#{jumin}, job=#{job}, addr=#{addr}, email=#{email}, phone=#{phone}, curdate=NOW() where id=#{id}
